channel.description: Recent content on Viktor Hong's Blog

item.title: Exexrcise
item.description: Exercise 8.3 $1$ Exercise 8.4 $$ \begin{aligned} \dfrac{\partial E_{n}}{\partial W_{kd}} =\sum ^{k}{k=1}\dfrac{\partial E{n}}{\partial y_{k}}\dfrac{\partial y_{k}}{\partial W_{kd}} =\sum ^{k}_{k=1} (y_k - t_k) x_d \end{aligned} $$

item.title: [Feature Detection] L2-Net
item.description: 0. Brief 在以往都是傳統方法(SIFT、ORB)來做特徵點偵測與匹配的時代，這篇 L2-Net 成為了 Deep Learning 時代的開山之作，從現在的角度來看這篇論文會覺得裡面每一個模組的設計都很合理，且也蠻簡潔的。 1. Introduction 這篇論文主要想要解決的是，在給定一張圖片 patch (32*32)當作輸入後，輸出一個描述該 patch 的 descriptor (128 維)。當然

item.title: 🙋🏻‍♂️關於我
item.description: About Me Hi! I am Zong-Wei, currently an AI algorithm developer at JIVOO, where we provide solutions for fingerprint recognition. In addition to fingerprint recognition, my research areas include: Object pose estimation Face anti-spoofing I look forward to sharing some paper readings and insights here! Publications Published Papers RDPN6D: Residual-based Dense Point-wise Network for 6Dof Object Pose Estimation Based on RGB-D Images IEEE/CVF Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR) Workshops DLGC, 2024 🏆 BEST PAPER in DLGC Authors: Zong-Wei Hong, Yen-Yang Hung, Chu-Song Chen Domain-Generalized Face Anti-Spoofing with Unknown Attacks IEEE International Conference on Image Processing (ICIP), 2023 Authors: Zong-Wei Hong, Yu-Chen Lin, Hsuan-Tung Liu, Yi-Ren Yeh, Chu-Song Chen Preprints Improving Facial Landmark Detection Accuracy and Efficiency with Knowledge Distillation Arxiv Authors: Zong-Wei Hong, Yu-Chen Lin
